name: host_io
label: host.io
description: host.io helps to get comprehensive domain name data, uncover new domains and the relationships between them, get DNS details, scraped website content, outbound links, backlinks, and other hosting details for any domain. This connector facilitates automated operation related to various domains.

fields.title: API Token
fields.description: Provide API token, used for user authentication.
fields.tooltip: Provide API token, used for user authentication.
fields.name: token

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the host.io connector to access the connector website.
fields.tooltip: URL of the host.io connector to access the connector website. e.g, https://host.io
fields.name: server

operations.title: Get Web Domain Details
operations.description: Get metadata scraped from a domain homepage.

parameters.title: Web Domain
parameters.name: web_domain
parameters.description: The domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of metadata.
parameters.tooltip: The domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of metadata.

operations.title: Get DNS Domain Details
operations.description: Get all the DNS records stored for a domain.

parameters.title: DNS Domain
parameters.name: dns_domain
parameters.description: Domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of dns records.
parameters.tooltip: Domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of dns records.

operations.title: Get Related Domains
operations.description: Get a count of the number of related domains for all supported lookups offered by host.io.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Domain name for which you want to retrieve related domains count for all lookups offered by host.io.
parameters.tooltip: Domain name for which you want to retrieve related domains count for all lookups offered by host.io.

operations.title: Get Full Domains Data
operations.description: A single endpoint that includes the data from WEB DOMAIN, DNS DOMAIN, RELATED DOMAIN and IPinfo.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of full data.
parameters.tooltip: Domain name for which you want to retrieve a host.io list of full data.

operations.title: Get All Domains
operations.description: Get all domains associated with :field, and a count of the total. The :value should be according to the :field and not necessarily a domain.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Provide field name to get associated domains.
parameters.tooltip: Provide field name to get associated domains.

parameters.title: Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value should be according to the field and not necessarily a domain.
parameters.tooltip: The value should be according to the field and not necessarily a domain.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Must be one of 0, 1, 5, 10, 25, 100, 250, or 1000. Default is 25.
parameters.tooltip: Must be one of 0, 1, 5, 10, 25, 100, 250, or 1000. Default is 25.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of data to view, 0-indexed. Default is 0. Pagination takes into account the limit.
parameters.tooltip: The page of data to view, 0-indexed. Default is 0. Pagination takes into account the limit.
